channel.title: Workshops on Aleksander Zubala

item.title: Mobile Academy
item.description: Overview Co-founder of Mobile Academy organistation which orgnise workshops for the iOS community around Poland and Europe. So far we’ve visted cities like: Warszawa, Kraków, Gdańsk, Łódz in Poland. We’ve also been in Berlin and Minsk. Technical details We’ve conducted the following workshops: Introduction to TDD on iOS Workshop about UICollectionView And we are constantly working on new ones.
